metadata.title: CVE-2019-20485 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
qemu/qemu_driver.c in libvirt before 6.0.0 mishandles the holding of amonitor job during a query to a guest agent, which allows attackers tocause a denial of service (API blockage).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20485` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10.30
libvirt0 - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10.30
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-1ubuntu10.30').
